ing: 1 (2 liter) bottle ginger ale (such as Canada DryÂ®)
des: "My family uses this for birthdays. I also used it for a Star Wars-themed bake sale (hence the name Yoda Soda). It always sold out faster than anything!"
ins: Heat lime sherbet in the microwave to defrost slightly, about 10 seconds. Place in a large serving bowl and cut into small chunks. Pour in enough ginger ale to cover sherbet and fill bowl.
